name: Way Back Home (rokolix)
description:
This game show last man's life in the submarine at WW2.You can feel the psychology of the man and try to escape.While doing that,explore the submarine and interact with the objects.

It is singleplayer short story game.

--CONTROLS--

-Move with A/D keys

-E for interaction

-SPACE for skip dialogue

-M for open/close map

**Trailer will be uploaded**

*There can be bugs.If you find,you can share at the comments.I will be happy

*Only Support 1080p

*Assets and Story are created by my friends.You can reach their page from link.

         Assets: https://actioncan.itch.io/

         Story: https://dogucan.itch.io/
